name: Emblem Technologies
tag_list: game, games, game-development-studio, social-games, iphone-developers, iphone-game-developers, iphone, ipod, ipad
overview:
At Emblem innovation is a way of life, and technology is but an extension of the human intellect.

With professionals who are expert in their fields and are abreast with the latest technology, Emblem delve into all major aspects of Information Technology. They have strong expertise in developing proof-of-concept and promotional applications social games and casual games.

Emblem’s motto, “Think Innovative,” is a concept that the company does very well by creating innovative products that continue to define the world of Gaming and Software.

Emblem, in product development division, is committed to bringing the best personal computing experience to students, educators, creative professionals, and consumers around the world through its innovative software, games, and Internet offerings.

Emblemâ€™s, in services division, is creating and developing new and exciting games for web and hand held devices.

Emblem Technologies continually embraces new technology, and is always looking for ways to improve the quality of their own products and the service they are able to offer their clients.
